content: I'm really excited to see how the campaign mode will play out, especially since it's supposed to be a more personal story for Master Chief. I've always been interested in the Halo universe's lore and characters, so I'm looking forward to learning more about Zeta Halo and the Instrument of Creation. By the way, speaking of playing games, I've been playing The Last of Us Part II for about 2-3 hours every day after work, and it's been an emotional ride so far.
